page.title: 12POPULATION AND HOUSES
page.content:
The number of houses being sold in Lutterworth is an indication of changes of population. According to a survey of local Estate Agents 450 houses a year are sold in Lutterworth. Detached houses and those in the price range Â£20,000 to Â£30,000 are the most sought after.
The houses in the price range Â£20,000 to Â£30,000 are generally small and in the centre of the town. Those in the price range Â£30,000 to Â£40,000 are semi-detached and on new estates.
The present population of Lutterworth is nearly 7,000. New housing estates are being built to accommodate the continuing growing population.
